p: Deep sequencing of RNA from purified virions of wild-type and mutant recombinant viruses showed that CAL virus accumulates low DVGs levels, which coincides with the reported high virulence of the CAL reference strain [ 1], and is similar to the F-IAV ( S6 Fig). The PB2/PA mut and PA mut viruses showed DVGs accumulation similar to CAL virus (2.6- and 1.3-fold change, respectively; Fig 5A), whereas PB2 mut had a 27-fold higher DVG ratio than CAL virus, which was almost 11-fold higher than PB2/PA mut (with the F-like polymerase) ( Fig 5A).
